General.Name: PayPro
General.Description: PayPro is a financial marketplace where any financial Decentralized Application (dApp) will be able to offer its services. PYP is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It's the utility token that will be used as the only accepted crypto-currency within the marketplace.

ICO.Description:
PayPro is a financial marketplace where any financial Decentralized Application (dApp) will be able to offer its services. PYP is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It's the utility token that will be used as the only accepted crypto-currency within the marketplace. 

Team:

  • Pablo Ruiz: CEO
  • Gabriel Llambias: CFO 
  • Enric Giribet: CTO 
  • Roger Baiget: J.r Developer 

The PayPro ICO will start on the 8th of January 2018 and will last until the 26th of February 2018. The ICO token allocaiton represents 40% of the total supply and will be available for a 0.0005 ETH starting price. The ICO funding cap is set at 5,000 ETH and users can participate with ETH. 

Token Reserve Split (60%):

  • 5% Community,
  • 15% Current investors,
  • 20% Sustainability reserve,
  • 20% Founders, team & future employee motivation packages

The PayPro ICO features a bonus and bounty campaign.

Bonus Structure:

  • 08th January '18 to 15th January '18
    Min. investment 15 ETH + 35% BONUS
  • 15th January 2018
    Min. investment 0.5 ETH + 20% BONUS
  • 16th January to 21th January' 18
    Min. investment 0.5 ETH + 15% BONUS
  • 22th January to 28th January '18
    Min. investment 0.5 ETH + 10% BONUS
  • 29th January to February 4th' 18
    Min. investment 0.5 ETH
